# `/toggledownfall` Command
Toggles the weather.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Game Directors</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### Toggle downfall
`/toggledownfall`

Turns precipitation on and off.
